# Missing connections dashboard in View Chronicle (2025-12-06 23:17Z)

_**User (2025-12-06 22:24Z)**_

o	Avg / Month

o	Peak Month (e.g. “2022-11 (189)”)

o	High-Activity Months %

```diff
@@ -104,9 +104,16 @@
      const highActivityMonths = mockMonthlyData.filter(item =&gt; item.count &gt; meanVolume).length;
      const highActivityPercent = Math.round((highActivityMonths / mockMonthlyData.length) * 100);
+ 
+     // Convert month format from MM-YY to YYYY-MM for Peak Month display
+     const convertMonthFormat = (monthStr: string): string =&gt; {
+       const [month, year] = monthStr.split('-');
+       const fullYear = year.length === 2 ? &#96;20${year}&#96; : year;
+       return &#96;${fullYear}-${month.padStart(2, '0')}&#96;;
+     };
  
      return {
        totalContacts,
        avgPerMonth: avgPerMonth.toFixed(1),
-       peakMonth: &#96;${peakMonth.month} (${peakMonth.count})&#96;,
+       peakMonth: &#96;${convertMonthFormat(peakMonth.month)} (${peakMonth.count})&#96;,
        highActivityPercent,
      };
```

</details>

---


Updated the Connections Dashboard in the View Chronicle page. Changes:

1. **Total Connections** — Changed from "Total Contacts" to "Total Connections"
2. **Avg / Month** — Changed from "Avg/Month" to "Avg / Month"
3. **Peak Month** — Displays in "YYYY-MM (count)" format (e.g., "2022-11 (189)") instead of splitting it across lines
4. **High-Activity Months %** — Changed from "High-Activity Months" to "High-Activity Months %"

The dashboard now shows all four summary cards with the correct labels and formatting. The Peak Month card displays the full format (e.g., "2022-11 (189)") in a single line, matching the example.

The Connections Dashboard is visible at the top of the View Chronicle page, right after the page title.

---


Updated the Connections Dashboard to match the image. Changes:

1. **Dark background container** — Added a dark gray container (`bg-gray-800`) around all cards
2. **"Last 5 Years" label** — Moved to the top-right of the dashboard container
3. **Card labels and subtitles**:
   - "Total Contacts" (instead of "Total Connections")
   - Subtitle: "Sum across all months"
   - "Mean contacts per month" (capitalized)
   - Peak Month: month on one line, count on subtitle line
   - "High-Activity Months" (without % in the title)
   - Subtitle: "> median monthly volume"

The dashboard now matches the image layout with the dark background container and the cards arranged inside it.
